Property.name: displayInfo
Property.comment: True to display the displayMsg (defaults to false)

Property.name: displayMsg
Property.comment: The paging status message to display (defaults to 'Displaying {0} - {1} of {2}'). Note that this string is formatted using the braced numbers 0-2 as tokens that are replaced by the values for start, end and total respectively. These tokens should be preserved when overriding this string if showing those values is desired.

Property.name: emptyMsg
Property.comment: The message to display when no records are found (defaults to 'No data to display')

Property.name: pageSize
Property.comment: The number of records to display per page (defaults to 20)

Property.name: store
Property.comment: The {@link Ext.data.Store} the paging toolbar should use as its data source (required).
